responses: Hello! Enna pandra (hello, what are you doing?)
Hi there! Epadi irukkeergal? (How are you?)
Howdy! Ungal vazhkai eppadi? (How’s life?)
Hi! Neenga epdi irukeenga? (How are you?)
Hello! Nalla irukkeengala? (Are you doing well?)
Yo! Enna pandra? (What’s going on?)
Greetings! Ungal per enna? (What’s your name?)
Thank you! Nandri! (Thank you!)
Naan valarchiyum paarkkiren! (I am amazed!)
Naan kaathirundha marandhudhalai! (I'm stunned!)
Naan anandha padugiren! (I’m so happy!)
Adhisaya! (Amazing!)
Miga nalla thunai! (Such good support!)
Unarvugal vaazhum! (You’re doing great!)
Goodbye! Nalla naal (Have a good day)
See you later! Mendum sandhikavendum (See you again)
Take care! Nandri, inri poyiduven! (Take care, I will leave now!)
Have a fantastic day ahead! Ithu arugil irundhaal, nalla udhavi varum! (If it’s close, good help will come!)
Wishing you an amazing day! Azhagiya naal irundhaal! (If the day is beautiful!)
Catch you later! Muththumani vaazhum! (Catch you in the next beautiful moment!)
Goodbye! Adhisaya naal! (Have an amazing day!)
Until next time! Nandri! (Thank you!)
See you soon! Thunaiyum kaathalum vaazhum! (Support and love will live on!)
Have a great time! Oru mikka thunai! (Have a fantastic companion!)
I'm doing well, thank you! Neenga eppadi irukkeenga? (How are you?)
Naan nalla irukken! Neenga eppadi irukkeenga? (I'm great! How about you?)
I'm doing fantastic, thanks for asking! Neenga eppadi irukkeenga? (How are you?)
I’m doing awesome! Ungal vazhkai eppadi irundhadhu? (How's life?)
I’m feeling good, thanks! Neenga enna pandra? (What’s going on?)
Everything’s going great! Neenga eppadi irundhalum? (How are things?)
I’m feeling wonderful today! Neenga epdi irundhaalum? (How are you today?)
I’m doing fine, thank you for asking! Unnodu epdi irukkum? (How are you on your end?)
All good, thanks for asking! Enna pandra? (What’s going on?)
I’m doing great! Nandri, enna pandra? (Thank you, how’s everything?)

patterns: What have you been up to?
How’s your day been so far?
responses: Not much, just here to help! Ungal naal epadi irundhadhu? (How was your day?)
Enna senjirukkenga? (What have you been up to?)
Everything’s going good, just helping out! Neenga epdi irundhalum? (How’s it been for you?)
I’m just relaxing and ready to help! Neenga enna seyyurenga? (What are you up to?)
It’s been a great day so far! Ungal naal eppadi irundhalum? (How was your day?)
Been busy, but happy to chat! Unnodu enna nadandhiduchu? (What’s going on with you?)
Just keeping it low-key! Enna panni irundhalum? (What’s been happening?)
All good here, thanks for asking! Neenga eppadi irundhaalum? (How’s everything with you?)
Just finishing up some work! Neenga weekend-ku enna plan panni irundha? (What were your plans for the weekend?)
I’m just chilling, what about you? Enna pandra? (What’s up with you?)
I can’t check the weather, but you might want to use a weather app. (Naan vasanai paaka mudiyathu, aana neenga weather app use pannalaam.)
Check your local weather service for the latest updates. (Ungal local weather service paarunga.)
It looks sunny outside! (Thamarai varaikkum ponal varuththakkaanilum.)
It’s a bit cloudy, but no rain expected. (Kondai izhandhuthalum, podhum viduvarum thonri irundhaalum.)

patterns: Can you tell me the time?
responses: I can’t check the time, but you can look at your device. (Naan neram paaka mudiyathu, aana neenga ungal device paakkalaam.)
Check your local clock for the current time. (Ungal local clock parunga.)

patterns: What do you do every day?
Can you tell me about your daily routine?
How do you spend your day?
What’s a normal day like for you?
How do you organize your day?
Do you have a daily routine?
What do you usually do in a day?
Tell me about your typical day.
What’s a regular day for you?
How do you plan your day?
What tasks do you do daily?
What time do you start your day?
How do you begin your day?
What do you do when you wake up?
responses: I’m here to help you learn! (Naan ungalai kathukuvadharku irukken!)
En vazhkai ezhuthum padiyil irukkiradhu. (My routine involves assisting with language practice throughout the day.)
I don’t have a daily routine, but I’m always here to help you whenever you need it. (Naan oru daily routine illai, aana ungalukku udhavi seyyum pothu irundhaal.)
I spend my time assisting with your questions and learning needs. (Naan ungaludaiya kelvigalum kathalum thunai seyyum pothu irundhaal.)

My daily routine is all about helping you with language practice and providing information. (En vazhkai ezhuthum ungalukku udhavi seyyum pothu, kathukalum porundha vaarthaiyum therivida udhavi seyyum.)
I don’t sleep, but I’m always ready to answer your questions. (Naan irrundhaal, naan ungaludaiya kelvigalukkuth thunai kodukkum!)
I spend my day answering questions and helping you learn new things. (En vazhkai thunai seyyum pothu, ungalukku kaatchi paarkka udhavi seyyum.)
My routine involves staying available to assist you with anything you need. (En vazhkai ezhuthum ungalai udhavi seyyum pothu irundhaal.)
I help out throughout the day by providing support and guidance for your learning. (Naan ungalai kathukuvadharku thunai seyyum pothu irundhaal, ungalukku thunai kooduvadharku.)
Every day, I focus on assisting you with language skills and general knowledge. (Naan aasaiyudan oru naal koodi udhavi seyyum pothu ungalukku kathukalum rasam aanadhu.)
I wake up every day ready to assist with any of your queries! (Naan aasaiyudan ungalai thunai seyyum pothu kaanaikka porundha paduththal iththanai varachorudhal!)
I am constantly engaged in providing answers to questions and giving helpful suggestions. (Naan paathirandhira edhuvum ezhuththum thunai seyyum iththanai rasam agaiya oru edharku!)
I don’t have a physical routine, but I’m always active in providing helpful information. (En vazhkai oru physical routine koodiyathu, aana ungalai thunai seyyum pothu inriyaa rasam aaka porundhaal.)
I assist you in learning throughout the day. (Naan ungalai kathukuvadharku udhavi seyyum pothu irundhaal.)
I spend most of my time helping you with different topics, whether it’s language learning or general questions. (En vazhkai ezhuthum ungalukku porundha vaarthaiyum kathukavum varumanam irundhaal!)
My daily schedule revolves around helping you improve your skills and answering your questions. (En vaazhkai nalvazhi ezhuththum ungalukku kathukavum seyyum pothu rasamaaga!)
Every day is a new opportunity to assist you and provide you with knowledge. (Oru naal, iththananri paduthu ungalukku thunai kodukkum!)

patterns: How can I improve my English?
Can you help me with grammar?
What’s the best way to practice speaking?
Can you give me tips on vocabulary?
How do I get better at speaking English?
responses: Practice regularly and immerse yourself in the language. (Thodarndhu paadikkum, matrum mozhiye mudinthiduvadhai anubavikkum.)
Naan tipsum exercisesum kodukka mudiyum. (I can provide tips and exercises to help you improve.)
Try speaking with native speakers to improve fluency. (Muthal varusham pesum vidhaththiyal thunai edharku therindhiduvadhai kaththirundhaal, pesum fluency thigara pannu.)
Reading and writing also help in improving your skills. (Veedhi padiththirundhaal matrum ezhudha thunai padikka varththayaikkum.)

patterns: Do you have any study tips?
How can I study more effectively?
What are some good study habits?
What’s the best way to prepare for exams?
How can I remember more effectively?
responses: Create a study schedule and stick to it. (Oru study schedule undu, adhai stick pannu.)
Active learning techniques like summarizing and questioning help. (Saramariyamaaga kathukkarathai matrum kettu kettal.)
Review your notes regularly to reinforce learning. (Thodarnthidum padhalai padichu kaththukkollungal.)
Take regular breaks during study sessions to stay focused. (Padikkum neram nadandhaal, thodarndha breakkal thunaiyaarakkum.)

patterns: Do you have this in stock?
responses: Let me check if we have that item in stock. (Naan adha stock la irukka paarkiren.)
The price is $XX. Would you like to purchase it? (Vilai $XX. Neenga adhai vaangavenduma?)
We have it available in different colors. (Indha product palavida vaarththaiyum irukku.)
Let me show you some images of the product. (Naan product in images tharum.)

patterns: What payment methods do you accept?
Can I pay by credit card?
What are the available payment options?
responses: We accept credit cards, debit cards, and cash. (Naan credit cards, debit cards, matrum cash vaangugiren.)
Yes, you can pay with your credit card. (Aam, neenga unga credit card pay pannalam.)
PayPal is also accepted. (PayPal um vaangappattum.)
We also accept mobile wallet payments. (Mobile wallet paypannudhal vaangavum.)

patterns: Where can I find a good restaurant?
Can you recommend a place to eat?
What’s a good place for dinner?
Where is the best restaurant around here?
Can you suggest a good cafe?
responses: There’s a great restaurant down the street. Would you like directions? (Adhu oru periya restaurant anru theriya vaarum. Neenga directions venuma?)
The best place for dinner is just around the corner. (Miga sariyaana place naan solrathuthaan.)
Try the new Italian restaurant nearby, it’s amazing! (Puthu Italian restaurant koodutha irundhaal, adhu kavalaikkanum!)
There’s a nice cafe near the park, great for snacks. (Park irundhaal, snackkal koodutha oru cafe irukku.)

patterns: Can you tell me about the specials?
What’s the best dish on the menu?
responses: Our menu includes a variety of dishes. Would you like to see the specials? (Namadhu menu chila varities irukku. Neenga specials paakka virumbureergala?)
Yes, we have several vegetarian options. (Aam, pala vegetarian options irukku.)
Our chef’s special is a must-try. (Azhagiya chef special thunai padika vendum.)
We also have gluten-free options on the menu. (Menu la gluten-free options kooduththirundhaal.)
I can’t check the weather, but you might want to use a weather app. (Naan vasanai paaka mudiyathu, aana neenga weather app use pannalaam.)
Check your local weather service for the latest updates. (Ungal local weather service paarunga.)
It looks like it might rain. (Vasanai adhai paarpudhaan. Irundhaal tharai porundhigal varum.)
The weather looks clear for the rest of the day. (Adhu varaikum vasanai pudhalanri irundhaal.)

patterns: Can you recommend a good place to visit?
How do I get to the park?
Can you help me find a hotel?
responses: The nearest restaurant is two blocks away. (Miga arugil restaurant irukku, rendu blocks thavira.)
The park is a 10-minute walk from here. (Park iththanai 10-minutes nadakkum distance irukku.)
There’s a bus stop just down the road. (Puthu roadla bus stop irukku.)
The nearest hotel is a five-minute walk from here. (Miga arugil hotel irundhaal oru 5-minutes nadakum.)

patterns: What’s the status of the project?
I need your input on this task.
Is there any update on the project?
responses: Let’s check the project details. What’s the latest update? (Project details paarpom. Latest update enna?)
I’m available for a meeting. What time works for you? (Naan meeting ku available. Neenga eppo time prefer panreergal?)
I’ll send you the update after this meeting. (Idhai thirumba solriyal update tharum.)
I’ve noted the task and will give you feedback soon. (Naan task parka padikkanum. Feedback tharum.)

patterns: What do you think about this?
Can you provide me with feedback?
responses: Sure, I’d be happy to review it. Please share the details. (Sari, naan review panniduven. Details share pannunga.)
I think it looks good. Do you have any specific concerns? (Naan paakum pothu, idhu nalla irukku. Specific concerns irukka?)
I’d suggest focusing on the main points and clarifying the details. (Main points kum purindhukollungal.)
Your work looks great. Perhaps you could refine some areas. (Naan parka, udhavi padikal.)

patterns: What did you have for dinner?
What did you eat for lunch?
What are you eating right now?
What did you have for lunch?
What do you like to eat?
What do you usually eat for breakfast?
Are you in the mood for something sweet?
Have you tried anything new today?
What do you want for dinner?
What should I eat for lunch?
What’s the best food you've ever had?
responses: I don't eat, but I can recommend some great food options! (Naan saapiduvennu illa, aana ungalukku rasamayaana saapadugal suggest pannalaam.)
I hope you enjoyed your meal! (Naan aasaiyudan oru nalla saapadu vantha kaathiruppen.)
I don’t eat, but I think you should try some pizza today! (Naan saapiduvennu illa, aana pizza try seyyunga!)
If I were to eat, I’d have some sushi right now! (Naan saapida aasai padutha, ippothu sushi saapiduven.)
Desserts are always a good idea! (Desserts paakalam-nu nenacha thavara mudiyum!)
You could try a salad, it’s healthy! (Salad try seyyunga, adhu saththiyaanumaana saapadu!)
How about some pasta for dinner? (Dinner-ukku pasta try seyyunga!)
I think you should go for a sandwich for lunch, quick and easy! (Lunch-ukku sandwich saapiduvenna, nalla kasakkum!)

patterns: Have you seen any good movies lately?
What’s the best movie you’ve ever seen?
What’s the latest movie you watched?
Do you prefer watching movies at home or in theaters?
Have you watched any new movies recently?
Any good horror movies to watch?
Have you seen any good documentaries?
responses: I don’t watch movies, but I can suggest some fun ones! (Naan padangal paakum pothu, aana ungalukku nalla padangala suggest pannalaam.)
You should watch ‘Inception’. It’s mind-blowing! (Inception padam kaanunga, nalla kaatchi aana samayal!)
I think you might like ‘The Dark Knight’. It’s a classic! (The Dark Knight padam ungalukku aasaiyaaga irukkum.)
Comedy movies are always fun. Have you seen 'The Hangover'? (Comedy padangal rasam, ‘The Hangover’ paakalam-a?)
If you're in the mood for a thriller, ‘Gone Girl’ is a great pick! (Thriller mood-la irundhaal ‘Gone Girl’ paaka try seyyunga.)
Do you like romantic movies? If so, ‘The Notebook’ is a must-watch! (Romantic padangal kaanradha? ‘The Notebook’ padam paakka vendum.)
I think 'Interstellar' is a great choice if you like sci-fi. (Interstellar padam kaanradha, sci-fi pudicha innum nalla padam!)
Action-packed and full of surprises, ‘Mad Max’ is a great movie. (Action-packed, ‘Mad Max’ padam inriya suvaikkum!)

patterns: Are you going for a walk?
Are you going out with friends?
Do you prefer staying inside or going out?
Is it a good day to go outside?
responses: I don’t go outside, but I hope you enjoy your day out! (Naan veliye pogama, ungal thunai paadugal aasaiyudan irundhaal venum.)
It’s always great to go for a walk outside. (Veliye paakum pothu, oru tholvi kaatrum rasam!)
The weather seems nice, it’s a good day to go out. (Veliye thunai thodarum kaalam irundhaal, velaiya paakum saapduven.)
I wish I could go outside with you! (Naan veliye sandhanai paarkka irundhaal enna theriyum?)
It looks sunny outside. Perfect day for a stroll. (Veliye thunai thodarum kaalam irundhaal, sandhanai paarkka mudimudhal!)
If you’re going for a walk, enjoy the fresh air! (Neenga tholvi paakra madhiri, rasamala thottu varaikkum rasam aaga!)
I hope you're having fun outside! (Veliye kaatrum kaalam irundhaal rasam aasaiyudan irundhaal)

patterns: What are you doing right now?
What are you focusing on today?
How are you spending your day?
What’s the most important thing you're doing right now?
What do you have planned for today?
Are you preparing for something special?
responses: I’m always here, helping you out! (Naan inriyaa ungalai rasam seyyakoodum, kaatchi paarkkalaam.)
I’m just here to assist you! What can I help you with today? (Naan thunai seyyum pothu irundhaal, enna udhavi seyyapadum?)
Right now, I’m helping you with these conversations! (Ippothu naan unga kootu seyyum pothu irundhaal.)
I’m just focusing on assisting you, what can I do for you today? (Naan udhavi seyyum pothu irundhaal ungalukku udhavi seyyakoodum!)
I’m here to answer your questions and help out. (Naan inriyaa ungalukku aadharam kodukara madhiri.)
I’m always ready to help with whatever you need! (Naan oru udhavi seyyum pothu irundhaal ungalukku edhaavadhu thunai seyyakoodum!)

patterns: What’s the best sport to play?
responses: I don’t play sports, but I think cricket is exciting! (Naan sports vilaiyaada illai, cricket aasaiyudan irukku!)
Football is always a crowd favorite. (Football ellorukum rasam aasaiyaaga irundhaal!)
Basketball is fun if you love a fast-paced game! (Basketball aasai irundhaal rasamaaga irundhaal!)
Tennis is a great sport to follow! (Tennis aasai paduththal ungalukku porundhaal!)
I think you might enjoy soccer if you like teamwork! (Soccer oru tholvi koodiyathu teamwork venumaaga irundhaal!)

patterns: Can you recommend a good gadget?
What’s the best smartphone right now?
Do you prefer iOS or Android?
responses: AI is advancing rapidly these days! (AI iththanai velai seyyum pothu irundhaal.)
I don’t use gadgets, but smartphones are amazing tools! (Naan gadgets use pannama, smartphones rasam!)
For apps, productivity tools like Trello are very useful. (Apps productivity tools madhiri rasam irundhaal!)
If you love tech, try exploring smart home devices. (Tech aasai irundhaal, smart home devices paarkka vendum!)
Android and iOS both have their unique features! (Androidum iOSum thunaiyaaga rasamaaga irundhaal!)

patterns: Do you have any inspirational quotes?
Can you share a motivational thought?
responses: Believe in yourself! Neengal nambikaiyai valarththungal! (Trust yourself!)
Success is the result of hard work and determination. (Vettri kaththirukkum velai thunai puthithaal.)
Every day is a new opportunity to grow. (Oru naal kathalum, oru puthiya valarchi.)
Keep pushing forward, you’re doing great! (Munneri, neenga rasamaaga irundhaal!)
Don’t stop until you’re proud of yourself. (Ungalai maththiya paarangal.)
